actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department; Labor Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to limit the amount of unemployment compensation payable for a week of unemployment, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require that unemployment compensation payments be rounded downward to the nearest full dollar amount.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to limit the amount of unemployment compensation payable for a week of unemployment, and for other purposes.
